effects.display_string: Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 62,808 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to mark their targets as Dead Ahead. Attacking the marked target grants 1,084 Critical Strike for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
